Azimuth.app.welcomebox: div( h3(HTML("Please upload a dataset to map to the mouse PanSci reference")), "Upload a counts matrix from an scRNA-seq dataset of mouse data in one of the following formats: hdf5, rds, h5ad, h5seurat. For testing, we also provide a demo dataset of 20000 mouse adipose cells (10x Genomics v3), which is loaded automatically with the 'Load demo dataset' button.", width = 12 )
Azimuth.app.refdescriptor: This reference was generated from the PanSci mouse organismal aging atlas originally described in Zhang et al., 2024, this data was integrated across 3 genetic backgrounds. Annotations are provided at the level of main cell type, sub cell type, and organ.
